name: Yupitergrad: Sneaki Peaki
description:
🌟🌌 ＦＥＡＴＵＲＥＳ 🌌🌟

🔸 Three Time Attack levels from base game.

🔹 Local leaderboards.
🔸 Yupitergrad's initial tutorial.
🔹 Extra voice overs from AI companion.
🔸 New adrenaline-pumping music tracks.
🔹 Chance to take a sneak peek of base game and its unique dieselpunk-in-space vibe.

🌟🌌 ＳＵＭＭＡＲＹ 🌌🌟

Show your potential, candidate!

Become a real acrobat in a Kosmonaut costume! 𝗬𝘂𝗽𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗱: 𝗦𝗻𝗲𝗮𝗸𝗶 𝗣𝗲𝗮𝗸𝗶 gives you the chance to try an amazing game about repairing a space station near Jupiter - Yupitergrad. In 𝗦𝗻𝗲𝗮𝗸𝗶 𝗣𝗲𝗮𝗸𝗶 you can test the controls, check its comfort, and try to get the best time on three specially selected boards in 𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗔𝘁𝘁𝗮𝗰𝗸 mode.

▁ ▂ ▄ ▅ ▆ ▇ █ 💠 𝙔𝙐𝙋𝙄𝙏𝙀𝙍𝙂𝙍𝘼𝘿 💠 █ ▇ ▆ ▅ ▄ ▂ ▁

𝗬𝘂𝗽𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗱 currently offers Campaign and Time Attack mode. The plot takes you to a space station near Jupiter, where a brave Kosmonaut has to repair many broken devices.

To move around, the hero uses special grappling hooks, thanks to which he can get to places inaccessible to ordinary people.

𝗬𝘂𝗽𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗱 is a dynamic platformer with a lot of puzzles, traps and wacky humour, sunk in futuristic dieselpunk sauce. In Time Attack mode you can test your skills by competing with players from around the world to see who will achieve the best results on 20 specially built levels.ound the world to see who will achieve the best results on 20 specially built levels.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1352020/Yupitergrad/
